title: Group portrait of birthday party, including, Barbara Jean Roberts, Louise Roberts, and Betty Lou Roberts, Terry Edwards and Bobby Edwards, Carol Tarplay, Lorraine Tarplay, and Butch Tarplay, Tommy Greene and Russell Greene, Juanita Allen, Gerald Strothers, Norma Oden, Billy Oden, and Wilson Oden, Edith Swan and Sonny Swan, and unknown woman, possibly Mrs. Tarplay, posed around Bettie Lou Tarplay, standing behind her birthday cake, in Tarplay home on Deary Street, another version
medium: black and white: Ansco Safety Film
